ia.title: Exoplanet AI Classifier
ia.desc: Enter all required Kepler Object of Interest (KOI) parameters to predict if this exoplanet candidate is confirmed or a false positive.
ia.errorInvalid: Please enter valid numbers in all fields.
ia.errorApi: Failed to get prediction. Please try again later.

exoplanets.title: NASA Exoplanets
exoplanets.desc: Filter and explore some discovered exoplanets, along with their main properties.
exoplanets.noResults: No planets were found with these filters.

game.title: Memory Game
game.desc: This is just a memory mini-game. Find the matching pairs of exoplanets by name and have fun while we explore the universe.
game.note: Note: This is a temporary mini-game. The actual game is still under development.

home.title: EXOPLANETS
home.subtitle: Explore new worlds beyond our solar system and discover planets orbiting distant stars. Each exoplanet has its own story waiting to be uncovered.
